sentences.en: She is really not only beauty, loveliness, and winningness, to my thinking, but also cleanness, concinnity , and holiness just as I shown the flowers are.
sentences.cn: 以我之见，诗就如我给大家展示过的花一样，不但美丽、可爱、动人，而且纯洁、雅致、神圣。

sentences.en: They are really not only beauty, loveliness, and winningness, in my opinions, but also cleanness, concinnity, and holiness just as I show the candock is.
sentences.cn: 以我之见，她们就如我给大家展示的睡莲一样，不但美丽、可爱、动人，而且纯洁、 雅致、神圣。

sentences.en: Uge —One of the famous fashionable brand name in France, is holding the great reputation with concinnity and elegance design over the world since 1920's.
sentences.cn: 法国知名品牌，始创于二十世纪二十年代，以优美典雅设计而享负盛名。
